hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select CTOT.CTOT_NAME, CTOT.CTOT_CODE, EOTE.EOTE_EVENT_OBJECT_NAME, EOTE.EOTE_EVENT_OBJECT_CODE, EOTE_INVENTORY_EFFECT from EO_ORDER_TYPE_EXTENSION EOTE left join CD_TS_ORDER_TYPE CTOT on EOTE.EOTE_ORDER_TYPE_CODE=CTOT.CTOT_CODE and EOTE.ORG_ID=CTOT.ORG_ID where 1=1 <<and CTOT.CTOT_NAME in (:orderTypeName)>> <<and CTOT.CTOT_CODE in (:orderTypeCode)>> <<and EOTE.ORG_ID = :orgId>>
